title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, stream, and pull models from Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, or tool callers inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user) – formerly Ollama-WebUI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models, and stream responses with simple builders.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, and manage models from Ruby scripts or Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community CLI wrapper around ollama-js for quick chat, model listing, and pulling from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; chat, generate, and pull models from .NET 6+ apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in Docker or Kubernetes.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model answers into any channel; configurable roles & rate limits.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that answers questions using a local Ollama model via Bolt framework.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; async client with chat, generate, and model management endpoints.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing REST endpoints for chat, embeddings, and model ops backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that talks to Ollama; supports multiple sessions and model switching on the fly.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes a typed REST API over Ollama with OpenAI-compatible chat completions.
